message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  This is a good starting point!
I think it's fair to take the lead.  You get a smaller share this time, but we can work something out later.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 80/20 this time, with me getting the larger share.  We can work towards a more even split in the future.
